channel.title: Need help running rs2dv
channel.description:
i get this error when i try to run run.bat or any other batch file from bin folder help pls [code]E:\Documents and Settings\Mantas\Desktop\rs2dv\bin>run run.bat Buildfile: ..\custom-build.xml
run: [java] java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: run/bat [java] Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: run.bat [java] at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) [java] at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) [java] at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) [java] at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) [java] at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) [java] at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) [java] at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) [java] Could not find the main class: run.bat. Program will exit. [java] Exception in thread "main" [java] Java Result: 1
BUILD SUCCESSFUL Total time: 0 seconds[/code]

item.title: Need help running rs2dv
item.dc:creator: @ltownerlt ltownerlt
item.description:
@ltownerlt wrote:

i get this error when i try to run run.bat or any other batch file from bin folder help pls

[code]E:\Documents and Settings\Mantas\Desktop\rs2dv\bin>run run.bat
Buildfile: …\custom-build.xml

run:
[java] java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: run/bat
[java] Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: run.bat
[java] at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
[java] at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
[java] at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
[java] at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
[java] at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
[java] at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
[java] at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
[java] Could not find the main class: run.bat. Program will exit.
[java] Exception in thread “main”
[java] Java Result: 1

BUILD SUCCESSFUL
Total time: 0 seconds[/code]
